short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the mapping of keyword to url by typing go and space in the address bar and then the keyword

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes the mapping from keyword to url more convenient. Without this plugin you need to write <URL_TO_BACKEND>/<keyword> to be able to map a keyword to url. It's very cumbersome to always write <URL_TO_BACKEND>. This extensions gets rid of this part.

You only need to type go and space in the url to enable the extension. Then you can just type the keyword. This is a lot faster and more convenient.

! IMPORTANT !
The mapping between the keyword and url is done in the backend. Thus, you need add the url of your backend server in the extension options to use this plugin.
